body_html: That would be an awesome feature. Some per-operation flag that specifies whether the GPU or CPU version should be selected by default. To my knowledge, if a GPU version is available, that one is always selected. @rmlarsen what do you think?
body_text: That would be an awesome feature. Some per-operation flag that specifies whether the GPU or CPU version should be selected by default. To my knowledge, if a GPU version is available, that one is always selected. @rmlarsen what do you think?
body: That would be an awesome feature. Some per-operation flag that specifies whether the GPU or CPU version should be selected by default. To my knowledge, if a GPU version is available, that one is always selected. @rmlarsen what do you think?
